| accessdate = 2006-08-27}}</ref>, works for reading many different Microsoft Works versions. It was later published as 'libwps'<ref> [http://libwps.sourceforge.net libwps]</ref>. As of [[December 2007]], no mainstream versions of [[OpenOffice.org]], [[AbiWord]], or [[KWord]] have included it for various reasons. OpenOffice.org has not included it because of restrictions with the Joint Copyright Assignment (JCA)<ref> [http://qa.openoffice.org/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=8938 libwps inclusion in OpenOffice ]</ref>, but OpenOffice.org variants such as [[OxygenOffice]], Go-OOo.org, [[NeoOffice]], and [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]] have included libwps. Also, libwps provides a command line converter.
+
| accessdate = 2006-08-27}}</ref>, works for reading many different Microsoft Works versions. It was later published as 'libwps'<ref> [http://libwps.sourceforge.net libwps]</ref>. As of [[December 2007]], no mainstream versions of [[OpenOffice.org]], [[AbiWord]], or [[KWord]] have included it for various reasons. OpenOffice.org has not included it because of restrictions with the Joint Copyright Assignment (JCA)<ref> [http://qa.openoffice.org/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=8938 libwps inclusion in OpenOffice ]</ref>, but OpenOffice.org variants such as [[OxygenOffice]], Go-OOo.org, [[NeoOffice]], and [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] have included libwps. Also, libwps provides a command line converter.
==Sponsored Edition==
==Sponsored Edition==
